entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
